name: geologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to geology (= the study of rocks and similar substances that make up the earth's surface), or to the geology of a particular area or place: We live in a part of the world that is geologically active. Geologically, Mount Diablo is a very, very interesting place. See
geological
More examplesFewer examplesAkkuyu is probably the most geologically stable region in Turkey.Geologically speaking, the earthquake wasn't a surprise.The northern wall is very complex geologically.
